pullRequest.title: Reject subscriptions to topics that don't exist
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Return GRPC status code NOT_FOUND when subscribing to topics that don't exist
Conditionally do the above based upon hedera.mirror.grpc.checkTopicExists so we can control the rollout of this change and ensure clients are properly notified in advance
Return GRPC status code INVALID_ARGUMENT when subscribing to an entity that exists but is not a topic (e.g. account/contract/file)
Return GRPC status code UNAVAILABLE when the connection to the database is down
Return GRPC status code UNKNOWN for all other errors
Don't leak arbitrary internal exception messages to client as they may contain sensitive information like IPs, etc.

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #498
Special notes for your reviewer:

Will open ticket in SDKs to request they retry with backoff when NOT_FOUND or UNAVAILABLE is received

Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated
